currently contains:

descriptionHtml:
LONG update: Hello everybody long time no \"see\"(I guess) you may have noticed that there\'s  been no activities for more than a moth well I didn\'t die I went on vacation and I was intending on doing a few minor things while I was on vacation but the piece-o-s*** laptop(censoring my self because I don\'t know what I can say on here) I brought with me die on me as in you can push the power button as many time you want its not turning on. but I\'ve got even more bad news(this not as bad as my laptop) my blender decided that it hates me it wont let me import nifs at all so I\'ll have to re-install that however if anyone wants to help me with this that would be great I know what I want to do I just cant link the ingots to the skeleton. So, if anyone wants to help message me you will be credited for you work

OLD Small update: my mod has been feature on YOUTUBE!!!! this is kind of awesome for me because this is my first mod 
[youtube]b1Om6g-zpaY[/youtube]
another person on youtube but I\'m dumb so I\'ll just post the link
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yZqvhjdLxo0&feature=youtu.be  

   Quick update: 1.2 
i was going to hold this off until i got the bow done but that\'s proving to be a bigger challenge then i though and this fixes some basic stuff that should be fixed.
This mod is for comical purpose. I just felt like being silly that\'s all nothing more.

currently contains:
Dagger
Sword 
Greatsword
Waraxe
Battleaxe
Mace
Warhammer
Staff
arrows (yes arrows)
Shield

Fixed:
fixed tempering (flawless,perfect, legendary)etc.

Upcoming:

soon to come:
bow
a full set of armor


Maybe to come:
More lore friendly Version I.E. fix the required ingots
different types of weapons (glass,elven,steel)
new weapons and DLC attachments (teh worlds best crossbow maybe?)

MORE?
If you find any bug please let me know
author: ShadowhunterEEP
